name: Ridgebury Gourmet
address: 677 Ridgebury Rd, Slate Hill, NY 10973, USA

reviews.text: Great French food and Pastries. Worth the trip.

I don't think I've ever seen someone put more care into making a sandwich like I did when I stopped by Ridgebury Gourmet yesterday.

Unbelievable fresh ingredients, bread that can only be described as "perfection", and prices that seem to be too good to be true: I 1000000% recommend Ridgebury Gourmet as one of the best sandwich shops I've ever enjoyed.

They're an absolute hidden gem and you owe it to yourself to stop by!!!

How have I never been here before?? I randomly drove by it because Maps took me through a weird back road, but I am so glad it did. The prosciutto tutto sandwich is incredible, made with fresh ingredients and the loveliest French baguette bread I‚Äôve ever had on this side of the river. The croissants are also some of the most authentic French croissants I‚Äôve had in the states. SO delicious and I am looking forward to the next time I pick up food here.
Great quality food
best food and pastries ive had in a very long long time! must visit to experience the traditional French style of yumminess!!‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è
Hidden Gem! Everything I‚Äôve ordered there has been amazing. A must try!
The best

A must do! Delicious food, charming owner, great coffee. Qe had Christian's delights for my daughter's shower. Everyone loved the food, so much so, we ordered more for the girl's trip. Highly recommend!

My Job decided to order here for lunch on Saturday after a few of us tried them earlier in the week & let me tell you it was absolutely delicious!! The food was amazing & we even got the most delicious brownies. The owner is wonderful & truly loves what he does he's such a sweet man. We will definitely be ordering lunch here again!!

Stopped in for a breakfast sandwich and got turned away because he was to busy with a another big order
Very disappointed
the best food prepared by a profesional chef. just wow. i tried the quiche mmmmmm
Had no idea they were here. Real nice surprise. Everything was very good.
Everything we had was delicious, my family walked out with 3 plates and a baguette. Fine take out dining, was pleasantly surprised and will be coming back in the future. Truly a hidden gem

I was visiting family for a few days and got to try out Ridgebury Gourmet. I came back every single day while I was there. I am French and it was impossible for me to find authentic French food not just in the region but in the US (including fine dining restaurants) until I found this gem. I am really impressed by what comes out of Chef Pierrel‚Äôs kitchen.

The taste is delicious, the ingredients are fresh and sourced locally or imported from France, the portions are good and the price is reasonable. The menu seems to change depending on the season. The French chef not only does great-tasting dishes, but also amazing pastry and desserts too! The chocolatine croissant and French baguette remind me of bakeries in France. The cr√®me br√ªl√©e, chocolate mousse and pear tart (with frangipane aka almond paste) are all amazing too! The soups are so flavorful and natural. On top of that, the chef is very nice and has a great sense of humor.

It is a take-out place (although I‚Äôve seen a table outside and a small bar/counter with stools inside next to the coffee area). Everything (besides the pastry and desserts) are made right away once ordered so it‚Äôs best to call prior to coming. I wish I was living nearby so I could come often, I will definitely come back when I‚Äôm in the area!

Hidden gem in Hudson Valley.
Good food made from a very nice person.
Traditional French cooking by an elderly French couple. You can taste the passion in the food. Highly recommend giving it a try!
Good food.
Amazing meals and reasonable prices with the exceptional service!

This place has some of the best, tastiest, and freshest food I‚Äôve ever had. And I don‚Äôt say that lightly I have a very high standard for quality food. Most of all , he is priced reasonably. He is a one man operation, but it is worth the‚Ä¶
A delicious meal! Very kind and sweet owner who was very welcoming and made a fantastic lunch! Definitely recommend and IÔ∏è will be back
Best off the beaten path find! The owner is so cute with such a big personality, his food is delicious and you can tell it‚Äôs made with love! Can‚Äôt beat the price either. Will definitely be back!
The Italian super is AMAZING!!
Amazing and delicious a true artist! Wish he opened a shop in Long Island! Ridgebury Road‚Äôs hidden gem!
Excellent chocolate croissants!
Excellent food. You cannot go wrong with anything on the menu.

I ordered the Italian Super Combo for lunch, all I can say is WoW
not your typical deli sandwich!
beautifuly and caringly made, wonderful
Delicious quality baked goods..nice menu
Really good food!
My husband and I bought the jambalaya it was delicious!  We will definitely be going back.  The array of desserts look fabulous too!
Very good food and friendly service

I have bought breakfast at Ridgebury Gourmet several times in the last couple months.
It‚Äôs been delicious every time.
I recommend the croissant with egg and ham.
I only drink decaf coffee & they always have a container of decaf coffee available and it‚Äôs DELICIOUS!
There are always a selection of baked goods. Most have been great. Sometimes I choose something that‚Äôs not for me, but my husband has always eaten whatever it‚Äôs been and liked it.
The one thing I would change is that customers should be able to tip when paying by card or Apple Pay.
Remember to call ahead with your order so it‚Äôs ready when you arrive.
REMEMBER to park in back in the parking lot and enter from there, in the back of the building.
Amazing food, fresh and reasonable prices!!
Always has the freshest most delicious items! Already planning our next trip back!

This place is wonderful.. a true French Chef ! Always greets you with a smile üòä his food is  Amazing and his prices are unbelievable! Definitely a must have so lucky to be so close I eat here regularly‚Ä¶

The Ridgebury Gourmet catered my sons‚Äôs first birthday. It was absolutely delicious.  Roasted chicken, mashed potatoes and green beans cooked perfectly. Everyone had empty plates including my son!

Christian also makes the most delicious handcrafted desserts and pastries, I go in for one portion of the tart and end up buying the whole tart! Creme Br√ªl√©e made from scratch, all available to go. It‚Äôs hard to not over indulge every time I go in!

Thank you again Christian for the memorable wedding you catered and now my son‚Äôs birthday!
Amazing, fresh, delicious food!
The BEST bread I have ever had in my life!
Everything is amazing!!!
This  be place is fantastic. So delicious. The salmon was so tasty and the chocolate moose was sooo smooth and silky and delicious.
Just had an awesome sandwich with homemade bread.
Good coffee and tasty breakfast sandwich
Love what they've done with the place! The meal was delicious and prepared quickly. I'd give more stars if I could but Google is stupid and only lets me give 5.
Great Meat and wonderful workers ‚ô•Ô∏è
Home town feel , the girls are always so kind and helpful , the sandwiches are fantastic
Ask for the ‚Äúbelly buster‚Äù before 11am (it‚Äôs a breakfast item) you won‚Äôt be disappointed. One of the best breakfast sandwiches around hands down.

Small deli/diner. There are 4 tables that seat 2-3 each. The store is very small, but the food is excellent. Ordered the onion ring burger which was cooked perfectly and was priced well. Chips and a soda are extra, chips are local brands.
Awesome service, awesome food, reasonable prices
Friendly staff and delicious food.
Great place to pickup lunch
